heading: Contact Me
subheading: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, collaborations, or just having a chat about technology and system design.
statusMessage: Feel free to reach out if you need my skills or have an exciting project to collaborate on.

letsConnect.heading: Let's Connect
letsConnect.intro: Hi there! I'm a passionate Backend Engineer specializing in scalable distributed systems, microservices architecture, and GenAI solutions.
letsConnect.description: Whether you want to collaborate on exciting projects, discuss technology, or just say hello - I'd love to hear from you!
